location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Visit of the Sultan of Muscat and Oman to England

physicalDescription.extent: 2 loose, unmounted, b&w photographs with captions on reverse.
Dimensions:207 x 254 mm303 x 253 mmCondition:The prints are in good condition, held in plastic sheeting.Process:Silver gelatin

mods.abstract: Genre/Subject Matter:Two official photographs of the Sultan of Muscat and Oman, Āl Sa‘īd, Sa‘īd ibn Taymūr, during his visit to England in 1938. The photographs were taken on April 1 and April 4 respectively. The visit was part of the Sultan’s world tour 1937–38.Each photograph was taken by a separate press agency.

name.namePart: Sultan of Muscat and Oman Sa'īd ibn Taymūr Āl Bū Sa'īd
